steps.title: Welcome to the guide of GGenerator !
text: A multi-purpose generator for every cases where you need random things !
When you are ready let's start the tutorial.

steps.title: Main sections
text: We have two sections :
On the left, the Rundown used to create a sentence
On the right, the Pouch of words to create lists.

steps.title: Output section
text: Here the result sentence will be shown.
Now let's continue with the Pouch of Words !

steps.title: Right section : Pouch of Words
text: The goal of this section is to create pouches, which are lists of things.
For example you can have a pouch named as animals with cat and dog in it :
Next how to create a pouch !

steps.title: Create a pouch
text: To create a pouch enter the name of pouch in the bar and press Enter or click the "Add pouch" button.
To add element to a pouch click on the "Enter a value ..." section and press Enter or the "submit â†µ" button next to it.
In the next section how to manage a pouch and its elements.

steps.title: Manage a pouch
text: In a pouch you also can modify its name by clicking on the pouch name, note that you cannot put a name of an existing pouch.
You can also in the same way change the name of the elements.
If you want to delete an element click on the red cross next to it, to delete a pouch click the red cross next to its name.
It cover everything you need to know about pouches ! Next Rundown section !

steps.title: Rundown section
text: The goal of this section is to create a sentence, it will be used as a template for the random generation.
A sentence is composed of multiples words, we have two types of them :
A pouch word : it's the name of one the list you created earlier
A static text word : it's used to add meaning to the sentence
Next detail on words !

steps.title: Words : Pouch
text: First to create a word click on the "+" button, you can create another word by clicking again on it or by pressing Tab.
If you want to create a Pouch word, put its name forwared by "@", don't put anything else, a pouch word contains only a pouch.
Click on next to continue with the Static text words.

steps.title: Words : Static text
text: To create a Static text word ... just type some text !
Note that you can modify your words by clicking on them, you can also delete them by remove their content.
When you finished you will have something like above.

steps.title: GGenerate !
text: When you're happy with your sentence and your pouches, click on GGenerate ! to generate a random result.
